entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 4:30 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
